Player History
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 1967...
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by St. Louis in 1968...
Traded from St. Louis to Minnesota on 6/25/1969 (Going to STL: C E. Battey, SS T. Reynolds, 2B B. Allen, RF W. Horton. Going to MIN: 1B S. Garvey, 3B M. Rogodzinski)...
Had first career hit on 4/19/1971, off Dave A. Roberts (CAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/12/1971, off Earl Stephenson (NYY)...

Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 8/29/1972...
